casebody.data:
In the Matter of Aaron S. FREUDMAN, Bankrupt. No. 167, Docket 23302. United States Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Argued March 7 and 8, 1955. Decided March 29, 1955. Sidney M. Wittner, New York City, for bankrupt-appellant. Lyman Stansky, Trustee pro se, New York City, for trustee-respondent.

Before MEDINA and HINCKS, Circuit Judges, and BURKE, District Judge.

PER CURIAM.

Affirmed on opinion of Judge Dimock filed June 1, 1954, 130 F.Supp. 701.
